data.text: For this cause were these men  worthily punished through creatures  like those which they worship,

But for admonition were they troubled for a short space,
For he that turned toward it was not saved because of that which was beheld,
Yea, and in this didst thou persuade our enemies,
For them verily the bites of locusts and flies did slay,
But thy sons not the very teeth of venomous dragons overcame,
